name: She Follows
description:
Story As a private investigator, it is your job to investigate an unexplainable and peculiar dissapearance at an abandoned motel. As you begin to piece things together, you begin to see that this was no normal dissapearance... The opposite in fact. Features
  • PS1-style graphics
  • Inspect items to unlock new information
Controls WASD: Movement Mouse: Look E: Interact

This short horror experience is just a prototype build of a idea, and to also test the capabilities of the new Construct 3 3D features (the engine used).

If you enjoyed the game, please consider leaving a review letting me know! :)

NOTE: Due to the use of new engine features, this game may be unoptimised on some machines causing performance issues. A potential fix for any performance issues is to play in windowed mode and to scale your screen size down.
